name: David D. RICHARDSON, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, John E. Wetzel, Secretary, Department of Corrections; and Kathleen G. Kane, Attorney General, Appellees

parties: David D. RICHARDSON, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, John E. Wetzel, Secretary, Department of Corrections; and Kathleen G. Kane, Attorney General, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of August, 2013, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
73 A.3d 576
David D. RICHARDSON, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, John E. Wetzel, Secretary, Department of Corrections; and Kathleen G. Kane, Attorney General, Appellees.
No. 7 MAP 2013.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 20, 2013.
